name: ☕Mùa Nắng Café
description: 'Season of Sun' in English. Tourists flock for their famous coconut coffee and cold-pressed citrus espresso. {D:A1,W:F12PF,w:F12PF,P:CM,p:RW,mesh:1}

events.description: Shutters down. The café rests in silence, only the hum of the fridge audible.
Shutters rise. Footsteps echo in the cool air. Bao hums while prepping beans.
Chatter and coffee steam fill the air. Coconut coffee cups fly off the counter.
Foreign voices laugh as the espresso machine hisses. Aprons swirl in phone cameras.
Low chatter. Bao experiments with syrups. Sketches scatter on tables. Music pulses slow.
Golden light slants across tiles. Tourists pose with citrus coffee. Fans spin overhead.
The air calms. Locals sip slowly. The grinder purrs its last hum for the day.
Lights dim. Dishes stacked. Mùa Nắng sleeps behind shutters once more.
Backpackers squeeze in. Extra coconut cream simmers. A sticky sweet buzz lingers.
